Jargon Term: Due to the progressive worsening of your congestive heart failure, you were started on a medication called Milrinone, which is given into your vein using your PICC Line.
Your symptoms improved and swelling decreased.
We have made appointments for you with cardiologist who will follow your response to the Milrinone, see appointment information below.
